headline.main: Russia Unlikely to Compete in Rio, European Athletics Chief Says
headline.print_headline: Russia Unlikely to Compete in Rio, European Athletics Chief Says

docs.snippet: European Athletics president Svein Arne Hansen does not expect Russia to return to international competition in time for next year's Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro....
docs.lead_paragraph: European Athletics president Svein Arne Hansen does not expect Russia to return to international competition in time for next year's Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.main: Former Newcastle Keeper Srnicek Dies Aged 47
headline.print_headline: Former Newcastle Keeper Srnicek Dies Aged 47

docs.snippet: Former Newcastle United goalkeeper Pavel Srnicek died on Tuesday at the age of 47, nine days after suffering a cardiac arrest in the Czech Republic....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Newcastle United goalkeeper Pavel Srnicek died on Tuesday at the age of 47, nine days after suffering a cardiac arrest in the Czech Republic.

headline.main: A Kickback by Any Other Name, Stinks Just As Bad

docs.snippet: Call it what you will, S.E.C., but letting banks only invest in hedge funds that pay for their business should be disclosed to the clients footing the bill....
docs.abstract: Call it what you will, S.E.C., but letting banks only invest in hedge funds that pay for their business should be disclosed to the clients footing the bill.

headline.main: Crusading Former Pentagon Chief Says Nuke Danger Is Growing
headline.print_headline: Crusading Former Pentagon Chief Says Nuke Danger Is Growing

docs.snippet: Late in a life lived unnervingly near the nuclear abyss, William J. Perry is on a mission to warn of a "real and growing danger" of nuclear doom....
docs.lead_paragraph: Late in a life lived unnervingly near the nuclear abyss, William J. Perry is on a mission to warn of a "real and growing danger" of nuclear doom.

headline.main: German States to Spend Around 17 Billion Euros on Refugees in 2016: Die Welt
headline.print_headline: German States to Spend Around 17 Billion Euros on Refugees in 2016: Die Welt

docs.snippet: Germany's federal states are planning to spend around 17 billion euros ($18.7 billion) on dealing with the refugee crisis in 2016, the newspaper Die Welt said on Tuesday, citing a survey it conducted among their finance ministries....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany's federal states are planning to spend around 17 billion euros ($18.7 billion) on dealing with the refugee crisis in 2016, the newspaper Die Welt said on Tuesday, citing a survey it conducted among their finance ministries.

headline.main: Algeria's Bouteflika Approves Constitutional Reform Proposal
headline.print_headline: Algeria's Bouteflika Approves Constitutional Reform Proposal

docs.snippet: Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika has approved a long-awaited constitutional reform package, state media reported, part of measures he pledged after taking office for a fourth term last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika has approved a long-awaited constitutional reform package, state media reported, part of measures he pledged after taking office for a fourth term last year.

headline.main: Cops: Man Returned to Home to Steal Pup Hours After Burglary
headline.print_headline: Cops: Man Returned to Home to Steal Pup Hours After Burglary

docs.snippet: Police say a Pennsylvania man tried to steal a puppy from a home he had burglarized hours earlier on Christmas Eve, taking presents meant for children....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a Pennsylvania man tried to steal a puppy from a home he had burglarized hours earlier on Christmas Eve, taking presents meant for children.

headline.main: Villarreal's Suarez on Barca's Radar, Says Luis Enrique
headline.print_headline: Villarreal's Suarez on Barca's Radar, Says Luis Enrique

docs.snippet: Barcelona coach Luis Enrique has been impressed by Villarreal winger Denis Suarez and could try to bring him back during the January transfer window....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona coach Luis Enrique has been impressed by Villarreal winger Denis Suarez and could try to bring him back during the January transfer window.

headline.main: PGA Tour Widening Gap in World Ranking Points
headline.print_headline: PGA Tour Widening Gap in World Ranking Points
